018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.STATIC;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.MAINTAINED;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.SpecialPropertyType.CONFIG_PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.EXEMPT_FROM_TOSTRING;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.GETTER_IS_DEFAULT;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PREFERENCE;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PROPERTY;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ReadLock;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_AddListener;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_RemoveListener;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_ToString;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.INSTANCE_VARIABLE_OF_CONCRETE_CLASS;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.UNCHECKED;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.createSuppressWarningsAnnotation;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
046import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
047import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.repeat;
048
049import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
050import java.io.IOException;
051import java.util.Properties;
052import java.util.StringJoiner;
053import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
054
055import org.apiguardian.api.API;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
057import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigurationChangeListener;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi.ConfigChangeListenerSupport;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.MethodSpec;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
064import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.AutoLock;
065import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants;
066import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
067import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils;
068
069/**
070 *  The
071 *  {@linkplain org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder code builder implementation}
072 *  for the basic stuff, as defined in
073 *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigBeanSpec}.
074 *
075 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
076 *  @version $Id: ConfigBeanBuilder.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $
077 *  @UMLGraph.link
078 *  @since 0.1.0
079 */
080@SuppressWarnings( "OverlyCoupledClass" )
081@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ConfigBeanBuilder.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $" )
082@API( status = MAINTAINED, since = "0.1.0" )
083public final class ConfigBeanBuilder extends CodeBuilderBase
084{
085        /*--------------*\
086    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
087        \*--------------*/
088    /**
089     *  Creates a new instance of {@code ConfigBeanBuilder}.
090     *
091     *  @param  context The code generator context.
092     */
093    public ConfigBeanBuilder( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
094    {
095        super( context );
096    }   //  ConfigBeanBuilder()
097
098        /*---------*\
099    ====** Methods **==========================================================
100        \*---------*/
101    /**
102     *  Adds the listener support to the new class.
103     */
104    private final void addListenerSupport()
105    {
106        //---* Add the listener support *-------------------------------------
107        final var field = getComposer().fieldBuilder( ConfigChangeListenerSupport.class, STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport.toString() , PRIVATE, FINAL )
108            .addAnnotation( createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getComposer(), INSTANCE_VARIABLE_OF_CONCRETE_CLASS ) )
109            .addJavadoc(
110                """
111                The support for the configuration change listener.
112                """ )
113            .build();
114        addField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport, field );
115
116        //---* Initialise the listener support *-------------------------------
117        var code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
118            .add(
119                """
120                //---* Initialise the listener support *-------------------------------
121                """ )
122            .addStatement( "$N = new $T( this )", getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), ConfigChangeListenerSupport.class )
123            .build();
124        addConstructorCode( code );
125
126        //---* Add the listener management methods *---------------------------
127        final var param1 = getComposer().parameterBuilder( ConfigurationChangeListener.class, "listener", FINAL )
128            .build();
129        code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
130            .addStatement( "$N.addListener( $N )", getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), param1 )
131            .build();
132        var method = getComposer().methodBuilder( STD_METHOD_AddListener.toString() )
133            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
134            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
135            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
136            .addParameter( param1 )
137            .returns( VOID )
138            .addCode( code )
139            .build();
140        addMethod( STD_METHOD_AddListener, method );
141
142        code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
143            .addStatement( "$N.removeListener( $N )", getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), param1 )
144            .build();
145        method = getComposer().methodBuilder( STD_METHOD_RemoveListener.toString() )
146            .addModifiers( PUBLIC, FINAL )
147            .addAnnotation( Override.class )
148            .addJavadoc( getComposer().createInheritDocComment() )
149            .addParameter( param1 )
150            .returns( VOID )
151            .addCode( code )
152            .build();
153        addMethod( STD_METHOD_RemoveListener, method );
154    }   //  addListenerSupport()
155
156    /**
157     *  Adds locking support to the new class.
158     */
159    private final void addLockSupport()
160    {
161        //---* Add the locks *-------------------------------------------------
162        var field = getComposer().fieldBuilder( AutoLock.class, STD_FIELD_ReadLock.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
163            .addJavadoc(
164                """
165                The &quot;read&quot; lock.
166                """ )
167            .build();
168        addField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock, field );
169
170        field = getComposer().fieldBuilder( AutoLock.class, STD_FIELD_WriteLock.toString(), PRIVATE, FINAL )
171            .addJavadoc(
172                """
173                The &quot;write&quot; lock.
174                """ )
175            .build();
176        addField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock, field );
177
178        //---* Initialise the locks *------------------------------------------
179        final var code = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
180            .add(
181                """
182                
183                //---* Create the locks and initialise them *--------------------------
184                """ )
185            .addStatement( "final var lock = new $T()", ReentrantReadWriteLock.class )
186            .addStatement( "$N = $T.of( lock.readLock() )", getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock ), AutoLock.class )
187            .addStatement( "$N = $T.of( lock.writeLock() )", getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ), AutoLock.class )
188            .build();
189        addConstructorCode( code );
190    }   //  addLockSupport()
191
192    /**
193     *  Adds &quot;unchecked&quot; to the
194     *  {@link SuppressWarnings}
195     *  annotation for the constructor if the given type is a
196     *  {@link java.util.List},
197     *  {@link java.util.Set},
198     *  {@link java.util.Map}
199     *  or an otherwise parameterised type.
200     *
201     *  @param  typeName    The type to check.
202     *
203     *  @see ParameterizedTypeName
204     */
205    private final void addUnchecked( final TypeName typeName )
206    {
207        if( typeName instanceof ParameterizedTypeName ) addConstructorSuppressedWarning( UNCHECKED );
208    }   //  addUnchecked()
209
210    /**
211     *  {@inheritDoc}
212     */
213    @Override
214    public final void build()
215    {
216        //---* Generate the default stuff *------------------------------------
217        addListenerSupport();
218        if( isSynchronized() ) addLockSupport();
219
220        //---* Generate the properties *---------------------------------------
221        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
222        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
223        {
224            generateProperty( i.next() );
225        }
226
227        //---* Create the initialisation code in the constructor *-------------
228        getConfiguration().getInitDataMethod()
229            .ifPresent( this::composeInitializationCodeFromMethod );
230        getConfiguration().getInitDataResource()
231            .ifPresent( this::composeInitializationCodeFromResource );
232
233        //---* Create 'toString()' *-------------------------------------------
234        createToString();
235    }   //  build()
236
237    /**
238     *  Composes the constructor code that initialises the properties from the
239     *  result of a call to the {@code initData()} method.
240     *
241     *  @param  method  The {@code initData()} method.
242     */
243    private final void composeInitializationCodeFromMethod( final MethodSpec method )
244    {
245        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
246            .add(
247                """
248                
249                /*
250                 * Initialise the properties from '$1N()'.
251                 */
252                """, method
253            )
254            .beginControlFlow(
255                """
256                try
257                """
258            );
259
260        if( method.hasModifier( STATIC ) )
261        {
262            builder.addStatement( "final var initData = $1T.initData()", getConfiguration().getSpecification() );
263        }
264        else
265        {
266            builder.addStatement( "final var initData = initData()" );
267        }
268
269        builder.beginControlFlow(
270            """
271            if( isNull( initData ) )
272            """ )
273            .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "isNull" )
274            .addStatement(
275                """
276                throw new $T( "initData() returns null" )""", ValidationException.class )
277            .endControlFlow();
278
279        PropertyLoop:
280        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
281        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
282        {
283            final var propertySpec = i.next().merge();
284            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
285            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL )
286                && propertySpec.getSpecialPropertyType().filter( spt -> spt == CONFIG_PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE ).isEmpty() )
287            {
288                continue PropertyLoop;
289            }
290            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PROPERTY ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
291            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
292            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PREFERENCE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
293
294            final var propertyType = propertySpec.getPropertyType();
295            final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
296            final var propertyName = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
297            addUnchecked( propertyType );
298
299            builder.beginControlFlow(
300                """
301                if( initData.containsKey( $1S ) )
302                """, propertyName )
303                .addStatement( "$1N = ($2T) initData.get( $3S )", field, propertyType.box(), propertyName )
304                .endControlFlow();
305        }   //  PropertyLoop:
306
307        builder.nextControlFlow(
308            """
309
310            catch( final $1T t )
311            """, Throwable.class )
312            .addStatement(
313                """
314                final var eiie = new $1T( "initData() failed" )""", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
315            .addStatement( "eiie.addSuppressed( t )" )
316            .addStatement( "throw eiie" )
317            .endControlFlow();
318
319        //---* Add the code to the constructor *-------------------------------
320        addConstructorCode( builder.build() );
321    }   //  composeInitializationCodeFromMethod()
322
323    /**
324     *  Composes the constructor code that initialises the properties from the
325     *  provided resource.
326     *
327     *  @param  resourceName    The name of the resource.
328     */
329    private final void composeInitializationCodeFromResource( final String resourceName )
330    {
331        //---* The code that loads the properties from the resource *----------
332        final var builder = getComposer().codeBlockBuilder()
333            .add(
334                """
335
336                /*
337                 * Load initialisation data from resource "$1L".
338                 */
339                """, resourceName )
340            .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING )
341            .addStatement( "final var resource = $1T.class.getResource( $2S )", getConfiguration().getSpecification(), resourceName )
342            .beginControlFlow(
343                """
344                if( isNull( resource ) )
345                """ )
346            .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "isNull" )
347            .addStatement(
348                """
349                final var fnfe = new $1T( "Resource '$2L'" )""", FileNotFoundException.class, resourceName )
350            .addStatement( """
351                final var eiie = new $1T( "Cannot find resource '$2L'" )""", ExceptionInInitializerError.class, resourceName )
352            .addStatement( "eiie.addSuppressed( fnfe )" )
353            .addStatement( "throw eiie" )
354            .endControlFlow()
355            .add( "\n" )
356            .addStatement( "final var initData = new $1T()", Properties.class )
357            .beginControlFlow(
358                """
359                try( final var inputStream = resource.openStream() )
360                """ )
361            .addStatement( "initData.load( inputStream )" )
362            .nextControlFlow(
363                """
364
365                catch( final $1T e )
366                """, IOException.class )
367            .addStatement(
368                """
369                final var eiie = new $1T( format( "Cannot load resource '%s'", resource.toExternalForm() ) )""", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
370            .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
371            .addStatement( "eiie.addSuppressed( e )" )
372            .addStatement( "throw eiie" )
373            .endControlFlow()
374            .add(
375                """
376
377                /*
378                 * Initialise the properties.
379                 */
380                """ )
381            .addStatement( "$1T value", String.class );
382
383        PropertyLoop:
384        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
385        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
386        {
387            final var propertySpec = i.next().merge();
388            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
389            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_SPECIAL ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
390            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PROPERTY ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
391            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
392            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( SYSTEM_PREFERENCE ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
393
394            /*
395             * Without a StringConverter we cannot initialise the property from
396             * the resource.
397             */
398            if( propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().isEmpty() ) continue PropertyLoop;
399            final var stringConverter = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().get();
400
401            final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
402            final var propertyName = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
403
404            builder.add( "\n" )
405                .addStatement( "value = initData.getProperty( $1S )", propertyName )
406                .beginControlFlow(
407                    """
408                    if( nonNull( value ) )
409                    """ )
410                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "nonNull" );
411            switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter, propertySpec.isEnum() ) )
412            {
413                case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $1T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
414                case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T()", stringConverter );
415                case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T( $2T.class )", stringConverter, propertySpec.getPropertyType() );
416            }
417            builder.addStatement( "$N = stringConverter.fromString( value )", field )
418                .endControlFlow();
419        }   //  PropertyLoop:
420        builder.endControlFlow();
421
422        addConstructorSuppressedWarning( THROW_CAUGHT_LOCALLY );
423
424        //---* Add the code block *--------------------------------------------
425        addConstructorCode( builder.build() );
426    }   //  composeInitializationCodeFromResource()
427
428    /**
429     *  <p>{@summary Creates the implementation of the method
430     *  {@link Object#toString()}
431     *  for the configuration bean.} The output of that method will be like
432     *  this:</p>
433     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>ClassName</i>&gt; <b>[</b>&lt;<i>PropertyName</i>&gt; <b>= &quot;</b>&lt;<i>PropertyValue</i>&gt;<b>&quot;</b>[<b>,</b> …]<b>]</b></code></pre>
434     */
435    private final void createToString()
436    {
437        //---* Create the 'toString()' method *--------------------------------
438        final var builder = getComposer().createToStringBuilder()
439            .addStatement( "final var prefix = format ( $1S, getClass().getName() )", "%s [" )
440            .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" )
441            .addStatement( "final var joiner = new $1T( $2S, prefix, $3S )", StringJoiner.class, ", ", "]" )
442            .addCode( "\n" );
443
444        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
445        final var lock = getConfiguration().getSynchronizationRequired()
446             ? getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock )
447             : null;
448        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
449            """
450            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
451            """, lock );
452        final var commentLen = nonNull( lock ) ? 67 : 71;
453
454        //---* Add the code *--------------------------------------------------
455        var addEmptyLine = false;
456        PropertyLoop:
457        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
458        for( final var i = getProperties(); i.hasNext(); )
459        {
460            final var propertySpec = i.next().merge();
461            if( propertySpec.hasFlag( EXEMPT_FROM_TOSTRING ) ) continue PropertyLoop;
462
463            if( addEmptyLine ) builder.addCode( "\n" );
464            addEmptyLine = true;
465            final var propertyName = propertySpec.getPropertyName();
466            final var comment = format( "//---* Property \"%1$s\" *%2$s", propertyName, repeat( '-', 80 ) ).substring( 0, commentLen );
467            builder.addCode(
468                """
469                $L
470                """, comment )
471                .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING );
472
473            if( !propertySpec.hasFlag( GETTER_IS_DEFAULT ) )
474            {
475                //---* We have a field … *-------------------------------------
476                final var field = propertySpec.getFieldName();
477
478                if( propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().isPresent() )
479                {
480                    final var stringConverter = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().get();
481                    switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter, propertySpec.isEnum() ) )
482                    {
483                        case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $1T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
484                        case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T()", stringConverter );
485                        case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T( $2T.class )", stringConverter, propertySpec.getPropertyType() );
486                    }
487                    builder.addStatement( "final var value = stringConverter.toString( $1L )", field )
488                        .addStatement(
489                            """
490                            joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1$$s\\\"", nonNull( value ) ? value : NULL_STRING ) )""", propertyName )
491                        .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "nonNull" )
492                        .addStaticImport( CommonConstants.class, "NULL_STRING" )
493                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" );
494                }
495                else
496                {
497                    builder.addStatement(
498                        """
499                        joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1$$S\\\"", $2T.toString( $3L ) ) )""", propertyName, Objects.class, field )
500                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" );
501                }
502            }
503            else if( propertySpec.getGetterMethodName().isPresent())
504            {
505                //---* We just have a getter … *-------------------------------
506                final var getterMethod = propertySpec.getGetterMethodName().get();
507                if( propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().isPresent() )
508                {
509                    final var stringConverter = propertySpec.getStringConverterClass().get();
510                    switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter, propertySpec.isEnum() ) )
511                    {
512                        case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $1T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
513                        case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T()", stringConverter );
514                        case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T( $2T.class )", stringConverter, propertySpec.getPropertyType() );
515                    }
516                    builder.addStatement( "final var value = stringConverter.toString( $1L() )", getterMethod )
517                        .addStatement(
518                            """
519                            joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1$$s\\\"", nonNull( value ) ? value : NULL_STRING ) )""", propertyName )
520                        .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "nonNull" )
521                        .addStaticImport( CommonConstants.class, "NULL_STRING" )
522                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" );
523                }
524                else
525                {
526                    builder.addStatement(
527                        """
528                        joiner.add( format( "$1N = \\\"%1$$s\\\"", $2T.toString( $3L() ) ) )""", propertyName, Objects.class, getterMethod )
529                        .addStaticImport( StringUtils.class, "format" );
530                }
531            }
532            builder.endControlFlow();
533        }   //  PropertiesLoop:
534
535        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
536        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
537
538        builder.addCode(
539            """
540            
541            //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
542            """
543            )
544            .addStatement( "final var retValue = joiner.toString()" )
545            .addCode( getComposer().createReturnStatement() );
546
547        addMethod( STD_METHOD_ToString, builder.build() );
548    }   //  createToString()
549
550    /**
551     *  Generates the methods, fields and other code for the given property.
552     *
553     *  @param  rawProperty    The property specification.
554     */
555    private final void generateProperty( final PropertySpec rawProperty )
556    {
557        final var property = rawProperty.merge();
558
559        //---* Create the field *----------------------------------------------
560        property.createField( this ).ifPresent( this::addField );
561
562        /*
563         * Create the constructor code for the initialisation of the property.
564         */
565        property.createConstructorFragment( this ).ifPresent( this::addConstructorCode );
566
567        //---* Create the getter *---------------------------------------------
568        if( property.getPropertyName().equals( CONFIG_PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE.getPropertyName() ) )
569        {
570            property.createGetter( this ).ifPresent( p -> addMethod( STD_METHOD_GetRessourceBundle, p ) );
571        }
572        else
573        {
574            property.createGetter( this ).ifPresent( this::addMethod );
575        }
576
577        //---* Create the getter *---------------------------------------------
578        property.createSetter( this ).ifPresent( this::addMethod );
579
580        //---* Create the 'add' method *---------------------------------------
581        property.createAddMethod( this ).ifPresent( this::addMethod );
582    }   //  generateProperty()
583}
584//  class ConfigBeanBuilder
585
586/*
587 *  End of File
588 */
